14 {

16  pcl_conversions::toPCL(*input, temp);

18  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Conversion to pclPC2, " << temp.data.size() << " points.");
19  pcl::PCLPointCloud2Ptr temp2(new pcl::PCLPointCloud2(temp));

22 }

50 void colorize(vector<pcPtr> input, pcl::CorrespondencesPtr matches, bool match, pcPtr output)
51 {
52  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM(input.size() << " planes to colorize");
53  pc_t cloud;
54  pc_t plane;
55  int current_index;
56  for (int i = 0; i < matches->size(); i++)
57  {
58  if (match) current_index = (*matches)[i].index_match;
59  else current_index = (*matches)[i].index_query;
60  plane = *input[current_index];
61  pcPtr planePtr(new pc_t(plane));
62  colorize(planePtr, (float)current_index / (float)matches->size());
63  if (i == 0) cloud = plane;
64  else cloud += plane;
65  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Total points: " << cloud.points.size());
66  }
67  *output = cloud;
68 }
69 
70 /*
71 * @bief Merge and colorize 2 sets of planes given their correspondences.
72 */
73 void colorize(calib::Planes input1, calib::Planes input2, pcl::CorrespondencesPtr matches, pcPtr output)
74 {
75  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM(matches->size() << " correspondances to colorize");
76  vector<pcPtr> planes1;
77  for (int i = 0; i < input1.clouds.size(); i++)
78  {
79  pcPtr temp(new pc_t);
80  MSGtoPCL(input1.clouds[i], temp);
81  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Adding " << temp->points.size() << " points plane");
82  planes1.push_back(temp);
83  }
84  vector<pcPtr> planes2;
85  for (int i = 0; i < input2.clouds.size(); i++)
86  {
87  pcPtr temp(new pc_t);
88  MSGtoPCL(input2.clouds[i], temp);
89  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Adding " << temp->points.size() << " points plane");
90  planes2.push_back(temp);
91  }
92  pcPtr cloud1Ptr(new pc_t);
93  pcPtr cloud2Ptr(new pc_t);
94  colorize(planes1, matches, false, cloud1Ptr);
95  colorize(planes2, matches, true, cloud2Ptr);
96  *output = *cloud1Ptr + *cloud2Ptr;
97 }
98 
99 /*
100 * @bief Merge and colorize a set of keypoints given their correspondences.
101 */
102 void colorize(pcPtr& input1, pcPtr& input2, pcl::CorrespondencesPtr& matches, pcPtr& output1, pcPtr& output2)
103 {
104  pc_t cloud1;
105  pc_t cloud2;
106  vector<int> current_index;
107  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Colorizing " << matches->size() << " matching pairs.");
108  for (int i = 0; i < matches->size(); i++)
109  {
110  current_index.clear();
111  current_index.push_back((*matches)[i].index_query);
112  pcPtr kp1(new pc_t(*input1, current_index));
113  colorize(kp1, (float)i / (float)matches->size());
114  // colorize(kp1, 0);
115  if (i == 0) cloud1 = *kp1;
116  else cloud1 += *kp1;
117 
118  current_index.clear();
119  current_index.push_back((*matches)[i].index_match);
120  pcPtr kp2(new pc_t(*input2, current_index));
121  colorize(kp2, (float)i / (float)matches->size());
122  // colorize(kp2, 0.5);
123  if (i == 0) cloud2 = *kp1;
124  else cloud2 += *kp2;
125  }
126  *output1 = cloud1;
127  *output2 = cloud2;
128 }

130 int* range(int n)
131 {
132  const int N = n;
133  int* array = new int[N];
134  for (int i = 0; i < N; i++)
135  {
136  array[i] = i;
137  }
138  return array;
139 }

141 pcl::CorrespondencesPtr array2corr(int a[], int n)
142 {
143  pcl::CorrespondencesPtr corr(new pcl::Correspondences);
144  for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
145  {
146  corr->push_back(pcl::Correspondence(i, a[i], 0));
147  }
148  return corr;

158 void publish(ros::Publisher& pub, const pc_msg_t& input)
159 {
160  pc_msg_t msg = input;
161  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM(msg.data.size() << " points to publish on " << pub.getTopic());
162  if (msg.data.size() > 0)
163  {
164  pub.publish(msg);
165  }

168 /*
169 * @brief Constructor
170 */
171 Matching::Matching(ros::NodeHandle* node, std::string name1, std::string name2)
172 {
173  this->name1 = name1;
174  this->name2 = name2;
175  this->node = node;
176 
177  this->radius = 0.01;
178  this->kp_dupl_rej = true;
179  this->kp_est_radius = 200;
180 
181  this->pub_color = this->node->advertise<pc_t>("/calib/planes/" + name1 + "_" + name2 + "/planes_color", 1);
182  this->pub_kp = this->node->advertise<pc_t>("/calib/clouds/" + name1 + "_" + name2 + "/keypoints_matches", 1);
183  this->pub_all_kp = this->node->advertise<pc_t>("/calib/clouds/" + name1 + "_" + name2 + "/keypoints", 1);
184  this->pub_matches = this->node->advertise<calib::Matches>("/calib/" + name1 + "_" + name2 + "/matches", 1);
185  this->pub_objects1 = this->node->advertise<pc_t>("/calib/clouds/" + name1 + "/objects", 1);
186  this->pub_objects2 = this->node->advertise<pc_t>("/calib/clouds/" + name2 + "/objects", 1);
187 
188  pcl::search::KdTree<Point>::Ptr tree(new pcl::search::KdTree<Point>);
189  this->kdtree = tree;
190 
191  this->kp_type = 1;
192  this->cut_reverse = false;
193  this->match_th = 1.0;
194  this->kp_est_radius = 0.5;
195  this->radius = 0.05;
196 }

198 void Matching::update(const calib::PlanesConstPtr& planes1, const calib::PlanesConstPtr& planes2)
199 {
200  this->planes1 = *planes1;
201  this->planes2 = *planes2;
202  this->callback_sync();

205 /*
206 * @brief Dynamic reconfiguer callback.
207 */
208 void Matching::conf_callback(calib::MatchingConfig &config, uint32_t level)
209 {
210  // transform
211  this->kp_dupl_rej = config.kp_corr_rej;
212  this->match_th_dist = config.match_th_dist / 1000;
213  if (config.extract_objects)
214  {
215  this->cut_th = 0.1;
216  }
217  else
218  {
219  this->cut_th = -0.1;
220  }
221 }
222 
223 void Matching::callback_sync()
224 {
225  pcl::CorrespondencesPtr planes_corr(new pcl::Correspondences);
226  int n = this->planes1.clouds.size();
227  planes_corr = this->get_corr();
228  // planes_corr = array2corr(range(n), n);
229  pcPtr msg(new pc_t);
230  colorize(this->planes1, this->planes2, planes_corr, msg);
231  publish(pub_color, *msg);
232 
233  pcPtr cloudPtr1(new pc_t);
234  pcPtr cloudPtr2(new pc_t);
235  pc_msg_t temp1 = this->planes1.point_cloud;
236  pc_msg_t temp2 = this->planes2.point_cloud;
237  convert(temp1, cloudPtr1);
238  convert(temp2, cloudPtr2);
239  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM(cloudPtr1->points.size() << " points");
240  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM(cloudPtr2->points.size() << " points");
241 
242  this->cloud1 = cloudPtr1;
243  this->cloud2 = cloudPtr2;
244  this->keypoints1 = remove_nans(this->extract_kp(cloudPtr1, this->planes1, this->pub_objects1));
245  this->keypoints2 = remove_nans(this->extract_kp(cloudPtr2, this->planes2, this->pub_objects2));
246 
247  pcPtr kp(new pc_t(*this->keypoints1));
248  pcPtr kp2(new pc_t(*this->keypoints2));
249  colorize(kp, 0.25);
250  colorize(kp2, 0.75);
251  *kp += *kp2;
252  publish(this->pub_all_kp, *kp);
253 
254  pcl::CorrespondencesPtr kp_corr(new pcl::Correspondences);
255  // n = min(this->keypoints1->size(), this->keypoints2->size());
256  //kp_corr = array2corr(range(n), n);
257  kp_corr = this->get_kp_corr();
258  pcPtr msg2_1(new pc_t);
259  pcPtr msg2_2(new pc_t);
260  colorize(this->keypoints1, this->keypoints2, kp_corr, msg2_1, msg2_2);
261  pc_t pc = *msg2_1 + *msg2_2;
262  publish(this->pub_kp, pc);
263 
264  calib::Matches matches;
265  matches.header = this->planes1.header;
266  shape_msgs::Plane p1;
267  shape_msgs::Plane p2;
268  for (int i = 0; i < planes_corr->size(); i++)
269  {
270  p1 = this->planes1.planes[(*planes_corr)[i].index_query];
271  p2 = this->planes2.planes[(*planes_corr)[i].index_match];
272  matches.planes1.push_back(p1);
273  matches.planes2.push_back(p2);
274  }
275 
276  pc_msg_t points_msg1;
277  pc_msg_t points_msg2;
278  pcl::toROSMsg(*msg2_1, points_msg1);
279  pcl::toROSMsg(*msg2_2, points_msg2);
280  matches.points1 = points_msg1;
281  matches.points2 = points_msg2;
282 
283  this->pub_matches.publish(matches);
284 }

286 /*
287 * @brief Compute point cloud normals.
288 *
289 * @param input Point cloud.
290 * @param radius Search radius for normal estimation.
291 */
292 pc_nPtr Matching::normals(pcPtr input, float radius)
293 {
294  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Compute normals of " << input->points.size() << " points.");
295  pc_nPtr normals(new pc_n_t);
296  this->norm.setInputCloud(input);
297  this->norm.setRadiusSearch(radius);
298  this->norm.setSearchMethod(this->kdtree);
299  this->norm.compute(*normals);
300  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("\t-> " << normals->points.size() << " normals.");
301  return normals;
302 }

304 /*
305 * @brief Compute VFH global descritpor from a point cloud.
306 *
307 * @param input Point cloud.
308 * @param normals Point cloud estimated normals.
309 */
310 pc_featPtr Matching::descriptor(pcPtr input, pc_nPtr normals)
311 {
312  pc_featPtr descriptor(new plane_feat_t);
313  this->global_est.setInputCloud(input);
314  this->global_est.setInputNormals(normals);
315  this->global_est.setSearchMethod(this->kdtree);
316  this->global_est.setNormalizeBins(true);
317  this->global_est.setNormalizeDistance(false);
318  this->global_est.compute(*descriptor);
319  return descriptor;
320 }

322 /*
323 * @brief Match detected planes
324 *
325 * @param desc1 Point cloud containing descriptor for each plane of the first cloud.
326 * @param desc2 Point cloud containing descriptor for each plane of the second cloud.
327 */
328 pcl::CorrespondencesPtr Matching::match_planes(pc_featPtr desc1, pc_featPtr desc2)
329 {
330  if (desc1->points.size() * desc2->points.size() != 0)
331  {
332  pcl::CorrespondencesPtr corr(new pcl::Correspondences());
333  this->corr_est.setInputSource(desc1);
334  this->corr_est.setInputTarget(desc2);
335  this->corr_est.determineCorrespondences(*corr);
336 
337  // this->corr_rej.setInputCorrespondences(corr);
338  // this->corr_rej.getCorrespondences(*corr);
339 
340  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Planes (" << desc1->points.size() << "," << desc2->points.size() << ") correspondances (" << corr->size() << "):");
341  for (int i = 0; i < corr->size(); i++)
342  {
343  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("\tPlane" << (*corr)[i].index_query+1 << " -> Plane" << (*corr)[i].index_match+1 << " (" << (*corr)[i].distance << ")");
344  }
345 
346  return corr;
347  }
348 }

350 pcl::CorrespondencesPtr Matching::get_corr()
351 {
352  // Global plane descriptor to match planes
354  // pc_featPtr desc1(new plane_feat_t);
355  // pc_featPtr desc2(new plane_feat_t);
356  // pcPtr cloud(new pc_t);
357  // for (int i = 0; i < this->planes1.clouds.size(); i++)
358  // {
359  // pc_msg_t plane_msg = this->planes1.clouds[i];
360  // MSGtoPCL(plane_msg, cloud);
361  // pc_featPtr featPtr = this->descriptor(cloud, this->normals(cloud, this->radius));
362  // if (i == 0)
363  // {
364  // *desc1 = *featPtr;
365  // }
366  // else
367  // {
368  // *desc1 += *featPtr;
369  // }
370  // }
371  // for (int i = 0; i < this->planes2.clouds.size(); i++)
372  // {
373  // pc_msg_t plane_msg = this->planes2.clouds[i];
374  // MSGtoPCL(plane_msg, cloud);
375  // pc_featPtr featPtr = this->descriptor(cloud, this->normals(cloud, this->radius));
376  // if (i == 0)
377  // {
378  // *desc2 = *featPtr;
379  // }
380  // else
381  // {
382  // *desc2 += *featPtr;
383  // }
384  // }
385  // pcl::CorrespondencesPtr corr(new pcl::Correspondences);
386  // corr = match_planes(desc1, desc2);
387  // return corr;
388 
389  // Match by normals similarity (assume pc orientations are similar)
391  pcl::CorrespondencesPtr corr(new pcl::Correspondences);
392  for (int i = 0; i < this->planes1.planes.size(); i++)
393  {
394  pcl::Correspondence c;
395  int best = -1;
396  float best_score = -99;
397  c.index_query = i;
398  shape_msgs::Plane p1 = this->planes1.planes[i];
399 
400  for (int j = 0; j < this->planes2.planes.size(); j++)
401  {
402  shape_msgs::Plane p2 = this->planes2.planes[j];
403  float score = p1.coef[0] * p2.coef[0] + p1.coef[1] * p2.coef[1] + p1.coef[2] * p2.coef[2] - 0.1 * abs(p1.coef[3] - p2.coef[3]);
404  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Match plane " << i+1 << ":" << p1.coef[0] << ", " << p1.coef[1] << ", " << p1.coef[2] << " with plane " << j+1 << ": " << p2.coef[0] << ", " << p2.coef[1] << ", " << p2.coef[2] << "\n\tcost = " << score);
405  if (score > best_score && score > -99)
406  {
407  best_score = score;
408  best = j;
409  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("new best !");
410  }
411  }
412  if (best != -1)
413  {
414  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Matching planes: " << i+1 << " -> " << best+1);
415  c.index_match = best;
416  corr->push_back(c);
417  }
418  }
419 
420  return corr;
421 }

423 kp_featPtr Matching::feat_est(pcPtr& cloudPtr, pc_nPtr& normalsPtr, pcPtr& surfacePtr)
424 {
425  kp_featPtr feat(new kp_feat_t);
426 
427  // this->kp_feat_est.setSearchMethod(this->kdtree);
428  this->kp_feat_est.setInputCloud(cloudPtr);
429  this->kp_feat_est.setInputNormals(normalsPtr);
430  this->kp_feat_est.setSearchSurface(surfacePtr);
431  this->kp_feat_est.setRadiusSearch(this->kp_est_radius);
432  this->kp_feat_est.compute(*feat);
433 
434  return feat;
435 }
436 
437 pcl::CorrespondencesPtr Matching::compute_kp_corr(kp_featPtr feat1, kp_featPtr feat2)
438 {
439  pcl::CorrespondencesPtr corr(new pcl::Correspondences());
440  // pcl::registration::CorrespondenceEstimation<kp_t, kp_t> est;
441  // est.setInputSource(feat1);
442  // est.setInputTarget(feat2);
443  // est.determineCorrespondences(*corr);
444 
445 
446  this->match_search.setInputCloud(feat1);
447  for (size_t i = 0; i < feat2->size(); ++i)
448  {
449  std::vector<int> neigh_indices(1);
450  std::vector<float> neigh_sqr_dists(1);
451  if (!pcl_isfinite (feat2->at(i).descriptor[0])) //skipping NaNs
452  {
453  continue;
454  }
455  int found_neighs = this->match_search.nearestKSearch(feat2->at(i), 1, neigh_indices, neigh_sqr_dists);
456  if(found_neighs == 1)
457  {
458  pcl::Correspondence c (neigh_indices[0], static_cast<int> (i), neigh_sqr_dists[0]);
459  corr->push_back(c);
460  }
461  }
462 
463  if (this->kp_dupl_rej)
464  {
465  pcl::CorrespondencesPtr corr_dupl_rej(new pcl::Correspondences());
466  this->corr_rej.setInputSource(this->cloud1);
467  this->corr_rej.setInputTarget(this->cloud2);
468  this->corr_rej.setInputCorrespondences(corr);
469  this->corr_rej.getCorrespondences(*corr);
470  }
471 
472  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Keypoints (" << feat1->points.size() << "," << feat2->points.size() << ") correspondances (" << corr->size() << "):");
473  for (int i = 0; i < corr->size(); i++)
474  {
475  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("\tKeypoint" << (*corr)[i].index_query+1 << " -> Keypoint" << (*corr)[i].index_match+1 << " (" << (*corr)[i].distance << ")");
476  }
477 
478  ROS_INFO_STREAM(corr->size() << " keypoints matches.");
479  return corr;
480 }
481 
482 pcl::CorrespondencesPtr Matching::get_kp_corr()
483 {
484  kp_featPtr kp1(new kp_feat_t);
485  kp_featPtr kp2(new kp_feat_t);
486  pc_nPtr normals1(new pc_n_t);
487  pc_nPtr normals2(new pc_n_t);
488  normals1 = this->normals(this->cloud1, this->radius);
489  normals2 = this->normals(this->cloud2, this->radius);
490  kp1 = feat_est(this->keypoints1, normals1, this->cloud1);
491  kp2 = feat_est(this->keypoints2, normals2, this->cloud2);
492  pcl::CorrespondencesPtr kp_corr;
493  kp_corr = this->compute_kp_corr(kp1, kp2);
494 
495  pcl::CorrespondencesPtr kp_corr_filt(new pcl::Correspondences);
496  for (int i = 0; i < kp_corr->size(); i++)
497  {
498  if ((*kp_corr)[i].distance <= this->match_th)
499  {
500  int a = (*kp_corr)[i].index_query;
501  int b = (*kp_corr)[i].index_match;
502  Eigen::Vector3f v(this->keypoints1->points[a].x, this->keypoints1->points[a].y, this->keypoints1->points[a].z);
503  Eigen::Vector3f w(this->keypoints2->points[b].x, this->keypoints2->points[b].y, this->keypoints2->points[b].z);
504  float dist = sqrt((v - w).squaredNorm());
505  if (dist <= this->match_th_dist)
506  {
507  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Keeping match with distance " << dist << "m (" << v[0] << ", " << v[1] << ", " << v[2] << " - " << w[0] << ", " << w[1] << ", " << w[2] << ")");
508  kp_corr_filt->push_back((*kp_corr)[i]);
509  }
510  else
511  {
512  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Reject match with distance " << dist << "m (" << v[0] << ", " << v[1] << ", " << v[2] << " - " << w[0] << ", " << w[1] << ", " << w[2] << ")");
513  }
514  }
515  }
516 
517  return kp_corr_filt;
518 }
519 
520 pcPtr Matching::extract_kp(pcPtr cloudPtr, calib::Planes planes, ros::Publisher pub)
521 {
522  pcPtr cutted(new pc_t);
523  pcPtr kp(new pc_t);
524 
525  cutted = this->cut_plane(cloudPtr, planes);
526  pub.publish(*cutted);
527  // cutted = this->cut(cloudPtr, this->param_cut);
528 
529  double res1;
530  double res2;
531  this->node->param<double>("/calib/" + name1 + "/preproc/size", res1, 20);
532  this->node->param<double>("/calib/" + name2 + "/preproc/size", res2, 20);
533  double resolution = min(res1, res2) / 1000;
534  this->iss_support_radius = resolution;
535  this->iss_nms_radius = resolution;
536  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("iss kp size = " << resolution);
537 
538  if (this->kp_type == 1 && this->iss_support_radius * this->iss_nms_radius != 0)
539  {
540  this->iss.setSalientRadius(this->iss_support_radius);
541  this->iss.setNonMaxRadius(this->iss_nms_radius);
542  this->iss.setInputCloud(cutted);
543  this->iss.compute(*kp);
544  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM(kp->points.size() << " remaining points after cutting to extract keypoints");
545  }
546  else if(this->kp_type == 2)
547  {
548  pcl::SIFTKeypoint<Point, pcl::PointWithScale> sift_detect;
549  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointWithScale> result;
550 
551  sift_detect.setSearchMethod(pcl::search::KdTree<Point>::Ptr (new pcl::search::KdTree<Point>));
552  sift_detect.setScales(this->min_scale, this->nr_octaves, this->nr_scales_per_octave);
553  sift_detect.setMinimumContrast(this->min_contrast);
554  sift_detect.setInputCloud(cutted);
555  sift_detect.compute(result);
556  pcl::copyPointCloud(result, *kp);
557  kp->header.frame_id = cloudPtr->header.frame_id;
558  }
559  else
560  {
561  kp = cutted;
562  }
563 
564 
565  return kp;
566 }
567 
574 pcPtr Matching::cut(pcPtr input, param_cut_t params)
575 {
576  if (params.x.enable || params.y.enable || params.z.enable)
577  {
578  pcPtr temp(new pc_t(*input));
579  pcPtr filtered(new pc_t);
580  if (params.x.enable)
581  {
582  this->filter_cut.setInputCloud(temp);
583  this->filter_cut.setFilterFieldName("x");
584  this->filter_cut.setFilterLimits(params.x.bounds[0], params.x.bounds[1]);
585  this->filter_cut.filter(*filtered);
586  temp = filtered;
587  }
588  if (params.y.enable)
589  {
590  this->filter_cut.setInputCloud(temp);
591  this->filter_cut.setFilterFieldName("y");
592  this->filter_cut.setFilterLimits(params.y.bounds[0], params.y.bounds[1]);
593  this->filter_cut.filter(*filtered);
594  temp = filtered;
595  }
596  if (params.z.enable)
597  {
598  this->filter_cut.setInputCloud(temp);
599  this->filter_cut.setFilterFieldName("z");
600  this->filter_cut.setFilterLimits(params.z.bounds[0], params.z.bounds[1]);
601  this->filter_cut.filter(*filtered);
602  temp = filtered;
603  }
604  return temp;
605  }
606  else
607  {
608  return input;
609  }
610 }
611 
618 pcPtr Matching::cut_plane(pcPtr input, calib::Planes planes)
619 {
620  pcPtr cloudPtr(new pc_t(*input));
621 
622  for (int i = 0; i < planes.planes.size(); i++)
623  {
624  shape_msgs::Plane plane = planes.planes[i];
625  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Cutting in normal direction: " << plane.coef[0] << ", " << plane.coef[1] << ", " << plane.coef[2] << ", " << plane.coef[3]);
626  // build a tf which z axis is the plane normal
627  // tf::Vector3 normal;
628  // tf::Vector3 point;
629  // tf::Vector3 z(0,0,1);
630  // tf::Vector3 axis;
631  // tf::Transform transform;
632  // normal = tf::Vector3(plane.coef[0], plane.coef[1], plane.coef[2]).normalized();
633  // point = - normal * std::abs(plane.coef[3]) / normal.length();
634  // ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("from: " << point.getX() << ", " << point.getY() << ", " << point.getZ());
635  // transform.setOrigin(point);
636  // axis = z.cross(normal);
637 
638  // // tf::Vector3 a, b(1,1,-(normal.getX() + normal.getY())/normal.getZ());
639  // // b.normalize();
640  // // a = b.cross(normal);
641  // // tf::Matrix3x3 mat(a.getX(), b.getX(), normal.getX(), a.getY(), b.getY(), normal.getY(), a.getZ(), b.getZ(), normal.getZ());
642  // // double r, p, y;
643  // // mat.getRPY(r, p, y);
644  // // transform.setRotation(tf::Quaternion(r, p, y));
645 
646  // float w = sqrt(((pow(z.length(), 2)) * (pow(normal.length(), 2))) + z.dot(normal));
647  // transform.setRotation(tf::Quaternion(axis.getX(), axis.getY(), axis.getZ(), w));
648  // transform = transform.inverse();
649  // if (this->cut_reverse)
650  // {
651  // transform = transform.inverse();
652  // }
653 
654  // // transform point cloud and cut in the z direction
655  // pcl_ros::transformPointCloud(*cloudPtr, *cloudPtr, transform);
656 
657  // param_cut_t params;
658  // params.x.enable = false;
659  // params.x.bounds[0] = 0;
660  // params.x.bounds[1] = 0;
661  // params.y.enable = false;
662  // params.y.bounds[0] = 0;
663  // params.y.bounds[1] = 0;
664  // params.z.enable = true;
665  // params.z.bounds[0] = this->cut_th;
666  // params.z.bounds[1] = 5;
667  // cloudPtr = this->cut(cloudPtr, params);
668 
669  // // get back to the initial frame
670  // pcl_ros::transformPointCloud(*cloudPtr, *cloudPtr, transform.inverse());
671 
672 
673  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr inliers(new pcl::PointIndices);
674 
675  for (int i = 0; i < cloudPtr->points.size(); i++)
676  {
677  tf::Vector3 point(cloudPtr->points[i].x, cloudPtr->points[i].y, cloudPtr->points[i].z);
678  if (i % 1000 == 0)
679  {
680  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Point " << point.getX() << ", " << point.getY() << ", " << point.getZ() << " with value: " << (point.getX() * plane.coef[0] + point.getY() * plane.coef[1] + point.getZ() * plane.coef[2] + plane.coef[3]));
681  }
682  bool side = (point.getX() * plane.coef[0] + point.getY() * plane.coef[1] + point.getZ() * plane.coef[2] + plane.coef[3] > this->cut_th);
683  if ((side && !this->cut_reverse) || (!side && this->cut_reverse))
684  {
685  inliers->indices.push_back(i);
686  }
687  }
688  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Extracted points: " << inliers->indices.size());
689  pcl::ExtractIndices<Point> extract;
690  extract.setInputCloud(cloudPtr);
691  extract.setIndices(inliers);
692  extract.setNegative(false);
693  extract.filter(*cloudPtr);
694  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM(cloudPtr->points.size() << " points remaining in point cloud.");
695  }
696 
697  return cloudPtr;
698 }
699 
700 pcPtr Matching::remove_nans(pcPtr cloudNans)
701 {
702  pcPtr cloud(new pc_t);
703  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr indices(new pcl::PointIndices);
704  pcl::removeNaNFromPointCloud(*cloudNans, indices->indices);
705  pcl::ExtractIndices<Point> rm_nan;
706  rm_nan.setInputCloud(cloudNans);
707  rm_nan.setIndices(indices);
708  rm_nan.setNegative(false);
709  rm_nan.filter(*cloud);
710 
711  return cloud;
712 }
